CanvasInfo - Class in model
Class containing information and logic about the canvas, placement of elements and logic related to positioning the board on the canvas.

Constructor using canvas and cellSize as arguments.

cellSizeTooltip - Variable in class controller.GoLFXController
 
centerPlacement(int, int) - Method in class model.CanvasInfo
Assigns values to placementX and placementY based on the width/height of the canvas, the cellSize, the boardWidth and boardHeight.

Changes the background colour.

Changes the colour of the cells.

Changes the grid colour.

Retrieves a board from an URL.
chords() - Method in class model.Sound
Method that manipulates the frequency of the wave.
ConcurrentGeneration - Class in model.BoardPack
A class that contains concurrent version of methods used to set the next generation.

A constructor that takes a DynamicBoard as an argument.
controller - package controller
The controller package consist of the controllers which combine the view elements and the the model elements into a coherent pice.
convertToReader(File) - Method in class model.FileHandler
Converts a File into a Reader object.
copy(Board) - Method in class model.Statistics
Method for making a deep copy of Board object.
countConcurrentNeighbhours(int, int) - Method in class model.BoardPack.ConcurrentGeneration
Counts the neighbors of the provided cell.
countNeighbhours(int, int) - Method in class model.BoardPack.Board
Adds +1 to all cells in the neighboring cell of an alive cell.
countNeighbhours(int, int) - Method in class model.BoardPack.DynamicBoard
Counts the number of neighbors for the cell at coordinate (row, column).
countNeighbhours(int, int) - Method in class model.BoardPack.StaticBoard
 
create2Darray(int, int) - Static method in class model.BoardPack.DynamicBoard
Creates an empty 2d ArrayList.
createAnimation() - Method in class controller.GoLFXController
Method for drawing graphics data to the screen, where the underlying data changes between each image(Animation).
createGif(byte[][], GIFWriter) - Method in class model.Gif

createSeparateThreads(int) - Static method in class controller.WorkHive
Prepares the threads that handles updating the board of neighbors and setting the next generation.

Creates the threads that handle setting the next generation for the board.
